articles.author: Bevan Hurley
articles.title: A third of vaccine skeptics would accept the COVID-19 shot if offered a $100 cash reward - Daily Mail
articles.description: A UCLA study of yet-to-be vaccinated Americans found 34% would be more likely to get the jab when offered $100. But public health experts warn there's a 'thin line between incentivizing and coercion'.
articles.content:
A third of Americans yet to receive a COVID-19 vaccine say they would be more likely to get the shot if offered $100, a study has found.
The cash incentives proved far more persuasive than an endors… [+9189 chars]

articles.title: Vaccine deserts: Some countries have no Covid-19 jabs at all - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: In Africa, in the Americas - and even in the Pacific - countries have no Covid-19 vaccines. And that's an issue for the whole world.
articles.content:
At the small hospital where Dr. Oumaima Djarma works in Chad's capital, N'Djamena, there are no debates over which coronavirus vaccine is the best.
 There are simply no vaccines at all.
 Not even f… [+6977 chars]
